meanings.definition: The quality or state of being enjoyable or pleasing.
meanings.sent1: The pleasurableness of the sunny day lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent2: The pleasurableness of the music made the party more fun.
meanings.sent3: The pleasurableness of the unexpected gift brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The pleasurableness of the laughter filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The pleasurableness of the delicious meal lingered long after it was finished.

meanings.definition: The ability to provide pleasure or enjoyment.
meanings.sent1: The pleasurableness of the movie made it a box office hit.
meanings.sent2: The pleasurableness of the massage helped her relax after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The pleasurableness of the joke had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The pleasurableness of the scent brought back fond memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The pleasurableness of the book kept her up all night reading.
